Your license will expire in 1 day.
A new program version is available. Please update the program from Google Play.
Cannot validate the program. Please check your Internet connection and make sure that the program was purchased from Google Play.
Error validating the program. Please reinstall the program from Google Play.

"In order to use the program, you need to validate it: verify that the program was purchased from Google Play.
An Internet connection to Google Play will be established when validating the program. Standard data charges apply, depending on your plan."
You can renew the license. To do so, you can enter the activation code that came with the new license, purchase a new license from the online store, or activate a One-click buy.

"If you do not have a license, you can purchase one from the online store.
Select \"Open\" to go to the online store for mobile devices."

With a One-click buy, you can use the fully functional version of the application. When you activate a One-click, the fixed amount specified in the One-click buy terms of use is debited from your mobile account. You can later opt out of the One-click buy in the application settings.

The free trial version allows you to familiarize yourself with all the application features. On expiration of the validity period of the trial version, use of the application is restricted. The trial version can only be activated once.
Please wait. Connecting to the server...

"You receive the activation code when you purchase a commercial license. It consists of 20 Latin characters and numbers in the xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx format.
Enter the activation code:"
It was not possible to activate the application.
Incorrect activation code. Please enter a correct activation code.

"To activate the application, it is necessary to connect to the Internet.
Select \"Settings\" to go to the Internet connection settings."
Device ID does not match the code.
Invalid date and time on the device.
Limit of activations of commercial license exceeded.
"Locking the device on receipt of SMS command 'lock:[code]'"
This device is locked! Please return it to the owner.
A secret code is used to prevent unauthorized access to the application settings, and is used to start Anti-Theft functions and hide personal data remotely.

"To enable Device Lock, Kaspersky Mobile Security must be set as the default Home screen. To do so, click \"Install\" and delete the default settings for the current screen, and then return to the Device Lock settings.
Current default Home screen: %s."
To enable Device Lock, Kaspersky Mobile Security must be set as the default Home screen.

"The default Home screen has been changed by another application.
The Device Lock function disabled.
To re-enable the Device Lock function, go to the application menu."
Help is not available when the device is blocked.
Send new number and lock device when the SIM card is replaced

"For security reasons, it is recommended to use at least 7 digits for the code.
Save the current code?"

To change the Privacy Protection settings, disable data hiding.
To enable locking for SIM Watch, Kaspersky Mobile Security must be set as the default Home screen.

"To enable locking for SIM Watch, Kaspersky Mobile Security must be set as the default Home screen.
Current default Home screen: %s."

"If you have forgotten the secret code, specify the email address to which Kaspersky Mobile Security will send secret code recovery information.
If the secret code recovery function is disabled, the secret code cannot be recovered."
The option to recover the secret code recovery will be disabled. To re-enable the option, you must reinstall the application.

"Go to the website %1$s and enter the email address that you specified to restore the secret code and in the device's identification code: %2$s. A message with the recovery code will be sent to the email address that you specified. Enter the code on the device."
Cannot open the website. Please check the Internet connection.
Now, if necessary, you can safely recover the secret code using the specified email address.
Please wait while information is sent to the server...
Invalid email address. The address contains characters that are not permitted. Please enter a valid email address.
Sends command for remote launch of Anti-Theft options and hiding information for private contacts
Display of notifications in the status bar about how the application is functioning

"Kaspersky Mobile Security protects your data against viruses and other malware. Kaspersky Mobile Security hides your confidential contacts, call and correspondence history for them, as well as blocks unsolicited calls and SMS. If your device is lost or stolen, Kaspersky Mobile Security can help you locate the device using special SMS commands while protecting your data stored on the device.
If you have any questions, contact Kaspersky Lab (http://www.kaspersky.com, http://support.kaspersky.com/helpdesk.html).
The digital signature is verified by Crypto-C-2.0, (C) CryptoEx LLX http://www.cryptoex.ru."
© 2012 Kaspersky Lab ZAO. All Rights Reserved.
"Allow incoming calls and SMS messages from contacts in the device's address book"
Blocks incoming calls and SMS from numbers containing letters.

To proceed with the application, make sure that the program was purchased from Google Play. Please, try validating the program again.
An entry with these criteria already exists.
Hiding of contacts and related history of calls and SMS correspondence

Automatic renewal of the license every 30 days
One-click buy temporarily unavailable. Please retry One-click buy activation later or choose another way to activate the application.
One-click buy is not available to your mobile operator. Please select another activation method or insert a SIM card for a different operator.
Cannot activate One-click buy without a compatible SIM card. Please insert a compatible SIM card and try again.
Cannot activate One-click buy. Server error (%d). Please try again later.
Waiting for a response from the activation server. Do you want to retry the One-click buy activation?
Cannot activate the application: unable to send SMS message to activate One-click buy. To try again, please click \"Repeat\". To cancel activation of One-click buy, click \"Cancel\".
Activating One-click buy for Kaspersky Mobile Security. This process could take up to 24 hours. If the application is not activated within this period, please contact Technical Support.

"The license is in effect only for the billing period. On expiration, you can re-activate One-click buy or select another method to renew the license from the application settings.
Cancel One-click buy?"
A scheduled scan of the whole file system is in progress...
A scheduled anti-virus database update is in progress...
Please configure the required SIM Watch settings
To enable SIM Watch, specify a phone number or email address to receive a new number and/or enable Device Lock.

"One-click buy for Kaspersky Mobile Security is currently activated. Renewing the license with the activation code will cause the remaining days of the billing period to be lost. The license term can be viewed under \"About license\" in the menu.
Cancel One-click buy and renew the license with the activation code?"
"Protection is disabled. Cannot validate the program."
Your license is still in effect. Days remaining until expiration: %d. Activating One-click buy will cause these days to be lost. Activate One-click buy?
A trial version has been previously activated on this device. It cannot be activated again.
Cannot establish a connection with the server. Please check your Internet connection and restart the update.
Cannot activate One-click buy. Please check that you have sufficient funds on your mobile account and try again.
Kaspersky Mobile Security cannot run if installed on the memory card. Please reinstall the application in the device memory.
A new version of Kaspersky Mobile Security is available. Do you want to update?
Downloading the new version of Kaspersky Mobile Security
Canceling download of the new version of Kaspersky Mobile Security...
Cannot update the application. Check free space on the memory card and try restarting the Kaspersky Mobile Security update.
"Do you want Kaspersky Mobile Security to stop notifying you about new updates %s and cancel the update? You can update the version later by starting the update manually."
Select a call for which you want to add the contact to the list of blocked contacts
Select a call for which you want to add the contact to the list of allowed contacts
Select the telephone number that you want to add
Select an SMS message for which you want to add the contact to the list of blocked contacts
Select an SMS message for which you want to add the contact to the list of allowed contacts
Full version of Kaspersky Mobile Security
Full version of Kaspersky Mobile Security
You have successfully installed full version of Kaspersky Mobile Security with enhanced features.
You have successfully installed full version of Kaspersky Mobile Security with enhanced features.
All your lists of numbers and application settings are automatically imported from the Lite version to full version of the application.
To start full version of the application correctly, you must delete Kaspersky Mobile Security Lite.
All your lists of numbers and application settings are automatically imported from the Lite version to full version of the application.
It is not possible to perform this action
To delete Kaspersky Mobile Security, go to the main application window > Advanced Settings > Uninstall Kaspersky Mobile Security.
Kaspersky Mobile Security is no longer activated as a Device Administrator.
Activating the application as a Device Administrator protects the application against unauthorized deletion and enables the application to lock the stolen or lost device automatically.
Kaspersky Mobile Security is no longer set as a Device Administrator. Self-protection is disabled. The application cannot lock the device by SMS command. To unlock, enter the secret code.

Welcome to Kaspersky Mobile Security:
\u0095 Anti-Virus. Protection against viruses and malware.
\u0095 Privacy Protection. Hide confidential contacts, and related call history and SMS correspondence.
\u0095 Call&SMS Filter. Block unsolicited calls and SMS.
\u0095 Web Protection. Online protection against malicious and phishing websites.
\u0095 Anti-Theft. Search for the device and data protection in case it was lost or stolen.

The Set-up Wizard will guide you through the initial configuration process.

Welcome to the extended version of Kaspersky Mobile Security:
\u0095 Anti-Virus. Protection against viruses and other malicious apps.
\u0095 Privacy Protection. Hiding of confidential contacts, and related call history and SMS correspondence.
\u0095 Call&SMS Filter. Blocking of unsolicited calls and SMS.
\u0095 Web Protection. Online protection against malicious and phishing websites.
\u0095 Anti-Theft. Search for the device and data protection in case it was lost or stolen.

The Set-up Wizard will help you to perform the initial application configuration.

To protect the application against unauthorized deletion, and to lock the device should it be stolen or lost, the application must be activated as a Device Administrator.

To do so, click %s and in the next window activate the application as a Device Administrator.
Apps incompatible with Kaspersky Mobile Security detected

"To ensure smooth operation, Kaspersky Mobile Security must be activated as the only Device Administrator. To do so, click \"Disable\" to remove Device Administrator rights from other apps.
The following apps are currently activated as Device Administrators:"
Other apps set as Device Administrators could hinder the operation of Kaspersky Mobile Security.
Enter the recovery code to unlock the device:
Incorrect recovery code. Please enter the correct recovery code.

"System screen lock is also disabled.
If you were using a system screen lock (e.g. a password or graphical pattern), please restore it in the device system settings."
Protection is disabled. To protect your data, it is recommended to select the extended or recommended mode.
For the application to react to new threats more quickly, it is recommended to enable Cloud Security Scan.
Additional scan of new apps via the Kaspersky Security Network cloud service enabled
Additional scan of new apps via the Kaspersky cloud service disabled
Kaspersky Mobile Security is ready for use.
All your lists of numbers and application settings are automatically imported from the Lite version to the full version of the application.
To ensure smooth operation of the full version of the application, the Lite version will be deleted.
Please wait while contacts are updated...

"For Anti-Theft to lock your device in the event of theft or loss, click \"Next\" and in the following window, set a provisional code to lock the screen in the device's system settings.
You will be able to reset this code in the future."

"Thank you. The Anti-Theft functions are working correctly.
You can now reset the screen lock code by clicking \"Reset and continue\"."
Kaspersky Mobile Security: unable to lock device. The application is not set as a Device Administrator.
New version of Kaspersky Mobile Security is successfully installed.
"Registered trademarks and service marks are the exclusive property of their respective owners. Android and Google are trademarks of Google, Inc."
If you like Kaspersky Mobile Security, please rate it on Google Play.

You can run Anti-Theft functions remotely or hide contact information on your or any other device with Kaspersky Mobile Security installed. You can do so by sending SMS commands from any device. You can send SMS commands from the application or send standard SMS messages with special text:

 - lock:[code] - to lock the device;
 - wipe:[code] - to delete selected personal data;
 - fullreset:[code] - to delete all data;
 - locate:[code] - to locate the device;
 - hide:[code] - to hide confidential contact information.
[Code] - this is the secret code of the application on the device to which the command is sent.

Attention! SMS commands are billed according to the mobile rate plan of the device from which the command is sent.
"Memory scan complete. Path: %1$s Files scanned: %2$s Threats detected: %3$d Threats neutralized: %6$d Files skipped: %7$d"
"Files scan complete. Path: %1$s Files scanned: %2$s Threats detected: %3$d Threats neutralized: %6$d Files skipped: %7$d"

Failed to update Anti-Virus databases from server %1$s. Error: %2$d
Anti-Virus databases are up to date. Update is not required.
"To enable Web Protection to scan websites as you visit them, set the standard Android browser as your default browser. Current default browser: %s. Click \"Next\" > \"Default settings\" > \"BACK\"."
"Click \"Next\". In the next window, select the \"Use by default for this action\" check box and select the standard Android browser - %s. Click \"BACK\"."
Add contacts that you do not want to receive calls or SMS messages from. To block calls and SMS messages from these contacts, select \"Blocked contacts\" or \"Standard\" mode.
Add contacts that you want to receive calls and SMS messages from. To receive calls and SMS messages from these contacts, select \"Allowed contacts\" or \"Standard\" mode.
This app can be used by criminals against your interests:
This app can be used by criminals against your interests: %1$s. Application: %2$s.

"Add contacts for which you want to hide information.
After that, you can hide information for them with a switch in the application main window."
Information for selected contacts is now displayed. To hide it, use the toggle switch in the main window of the application.

"An Internet connection is required to update the databases.
Select \"Settings\" to go to the Internet connection settings."
"Deleting all data, restoring factory settings on receipt of SMS command 'fullreset:[code]'"
Website scanned and blocked by Kaspersky Mobile Security.
Protection against malicious and fake websites
Blocking malicious and fake websites before they are opened.
Web Protection only checks websites in the standard Android browser and does not check them in other browsers.

"For Web Protection to check all accessed websites, it is recommended to set the standard Android browser as the default browser. Current default browser: %s.
If you do not want to change the default browser, launch the standard Android browser to safely use the network."
Detection of adware and apps that can be used by criminals for damaging your device or personal data
